metadata.description:
The Exverse pass, the very first 3000 supply NFT launch from the team at Exverse. (2000/ERC, 1000/NEAR)

More info at exverse.io.

-Lifetime season pass to our game

-Early playtesting

-Special holder only skin claims

-Higher % of token rewards

*Having more than one Exverse pass does not allow you to earn more tokens.
metadata.name: Exverse Pass
